Package me.Treidex.GameAPI.GameObject.Components

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
me.Treidex.GameAPI.GameObject.Components.Component
me.Treidex.GameAPI.GameObject.Components.Transform
public class Transform
extends Component
Transforms Store Position, Size, and Rotation; basically storing Game Object details.
Author:
Treidex
